blockquote.para: This event allows a plugin to provide an instance of an email send provider which overrides the default implementation packaged with MantisBT. The first plugin response is used. If null, then the default provider will be used.

listitem.para: <EmailSender>: The email provider to use or null to use the standard provider.

blockquote.para: This event allows a plugin to specify a set of users to be included as recipients for a notification. The set of users returned is added to the list of recipients already generated from the existing notification flags and selection process.

listitem.para: <Array>: User IDs to include as recipients

blockquote.para: This event allows a plugin to selectively exclude individual users from the recipient list for a notification. The event is signalled for every user in the final recipient list, including recipients added by the event NOTIFY_USER_INCLUDE as described above.

listitem.para: <Boolean>: True to exclude the user, false otherwise

blockquote.para: This event allows a plugin to selectively overwrite notification settings for recipients of certain notifications. It is signalled for every user in the final recipient list, including recipients added by the event NOTIFY_USER_INCLUDE as described above.

listitem.para: <String>: "1" if user has that notification enabled, "0" otherwise
<String>: Field in the user_pref table corresponding to that notification setting

<Array>: Array with all the parameters in the same order as they were received. The first element of the returned array will be used to overwrite the value set in the user preferences for that particular notification. A value equals to the OFF constant is interpreted as a disabled notification.
